SELECT notice.create_date,notice.create_user,notice.update_date,notice.update_user, u.user_name createUserName,notice.id,notice.title,notice.content FROM t_notice notice left join sys_user u on u.id = notice.create_user where 1 = 1
and notice.title like CONCAT("%",#{title},"%")
and notice.create_user = #{createUser}
order by notice.create_date
